---
title: "Get Aptos Name From Address"
---



import { Aside } from '@astrojs/starlight/components';





`getNameFromAddress` looks for a registered domain name for a given account. For example, a user could register their account with the Aptos Name Service to be associated to `love.apt`. You can learn more by going to https://www.aptosnames.com/.

<Aside type="caution">
  This only returns _active_ names. Name registrations can expire if not renewed, which may explain some empty results.
</Aside>

<Aside type="note">
  Try it yourself! You can customize the variables at the bottom of the editor.
</Aside>

{/* <GraphQLEditor query={"type":"mdxJsxAttributeValueExpression","value":"`query getNameFromAddress($registered_address: String) {\ncurrent_aptos_names(\n  where: {registered_address: {_eq: subdomain\n}\n}`","data":{"estree":{"type":"Program","start":664,"end":979,"body":[{"type":"ExpressionStatement","expression":{"type":"TemplateLiteral","start":664,"end":979,"loc":{"start":{"line":17,"column":9,"offset":664},"end":{"line":26,"column":2,"offset":979}},"expressions":[],"quasis":[{"type":"TemplateElement","start":665,"end":978,"loc":{"start":{"line":17,"column":10,"offset":665},"end":{"line":26,"column":1,"offset":978}},"value":{"raw":"query \"0xca4349ce902a656570a4f344cc8f360fb13fd41b5fae77bcc9ee82252d67539e\"\n}`","data":{"estree":{"type":"Program","start":994,"end":1092,"body":[{"type":"ExpressionStatement","expression":{"type":"TemplateLiteral","start":994,"end":1092,"loc":{"start":{"line":27,"column":13,"offset":994},"end":{"line":29,"column":2,"offset":1092}},"expressions":[],"quasis":[{"type":"TemplateElement","start":995,"end":1091,"loc":{"start":{"line":27,"column":14,"offset":995},"end":{"line":29,"column":1,"offset":1091}},"value":{"raw":"{\n\"registered_address\": */}

#### Variables:

- `$registered_address`: **String** - The account address you want to find any associated active domain names for. Ex. `"0xca4349ce902a656570a4f344cc8f360fb13fd41b5fae77bcc9ee82252d67539e"`.
